question: Who founded the Ramakrishna Mission in 1896 to carry on humanitarian relief and social work?
explanation:
Ramakrishna mission is a Hindu religious and spiritual organisation which was founded on 1 May 1897 by Swami Vivekananda. The headquarter of the organization is located at Belur Math, Howrah. Sri Ramakrishna Paramahansa Dev was an saint, and religious leader in 19th century Bengal. He was a Priest at Dakshineswar Kali Temple. Swami Vivekananda was one
of the notable disciples of Ramkrishna Dev. It was said that before his death Ramkrishna Dev transferred all his spiritual power to Vivekananda.
